title: Unitree G1 claims to be the smoothest humanoid robot yet
description: Unitree’s G1 humanoid robot just got an “agile upgrade,” showcasing improved mobility and a quick-swap battery.
excerpt: With its latest “agile upgrade,” the G1 showcases impressive mobility and a quick-swap battery system.
